item.title: KAshI remodelling faults
item.description:
Source: TW

a 18th century shrine built by Ahalya Bai Holkar - showing a likeness of herself doing abhisheka to rudra, and a Shiv Linga is front - along with many other shrines such as ghorakālī shrine beneath are destroyed.

The Canada Annapurna was a small vigraha stolen from another shrine by an American in early 1900 from an open shrine near the ghat, like there are many. Repeat: this was not the “original” of Vishwanath temple panchayatan as popularly claimed by BJP supporters. The Shringeri Shankaracharya Swami did not consecrate this canada Vigraha contrary to your claim. Yogi ji did.
